General.Name: Edoc Acquisition Corp
General.Description: Edoc Acquisition Corp. focuses on acquiring, engaging in a share exchange, share reconstruction and amalgamation with, purchasing all or substantially all of the assets of, entering into contractual arrangements with, or engaging in any other similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities in the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Victor, New York.
General.Address: 7612 Main Street Fishers, Victor, NY, United States, 14564
